title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.86 - Nonfood-contact surface cleanability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-5.86 - Nonfood-contact surface cleanability

State Regulations

Nonfood-contact surfaces of the interior of vending machines are to be designed and constructed to permit easy cleaning and to facilitate maintenance operations, and are to be kept clean and in good repair. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-5.86

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
